text: Leslie Galen Young (October 16, 1975 â€“ June 5, 2021) was an American professional basketball player. He played two years of Division I college basketball for the Charlotte 49ers. He played professionally in the United States and abroad for 13 years, winning a CBA championship in 2007. Young was killed while inside his mother's house in Memphis, Tennessee on June 5, 2021 after a car crashed into the house and killed him. He was 45 years old. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:American basketball players Category:American crime victims Category:Power forwards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Memphis, Tennessee
title: Galen Young
